answerText: Lake Van [accept Van Golu][10] Lake Van is the largest lake in this country, which straddles two continents. A railway connecting this country to Iran utilized a train ferry which traversed the lake.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Minnesota A  | 11 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: The Church of the Holy Cross on Akdamar Island is located on this lake. For 10 points each: [10] Name this lake, the center of the ancient kingdom of Ararat. It has no outlet and its other islands include Carpanak and Kus Island.
